data.name: Error.NotFound
data.value: The requested resource was not found.

data.value: A conflict occurred with the current state of the resource.

data.value: Authentication is required to access this resource.

data.name: Error.Forbidden
data.value: You do not have permission to access this resource.

data.name: Error.ValidationFailed
data.value: One or more validation errors occurred.

data.name: Error.InternalServerError
data.value: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

data.name: Error.BadRequest
data.value: The request was invalid or cannot be processed.

data.name: Error.ServiceUnavailable
data.value: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

data.value: The {0} field is required.

data.value: The email address is not valid.

data.value: The {0} field has an invalid format.

data.name: Validation.MustBePositive

data.value: The {0} field must be between {1} and {2}.

data.value: The {0} field contains an invalid date.

data.value: The {0} field must be a future date.

data.name: Validation.PastDate
data.value: The {0} field must be a past date.
